name: Drivecast
tag_list: cloud, media, iphone, facebook, video, music, podcast, usb, recorder
overview:
DriveCast is a cloud media recorder and a web-based media manager for your different devices: USB keys, portable media players, smartphones and cars. It catches your favorite audio/video contents from the web so that you can synchronize them on your devices in order to play them whenever and wherever you want.

DriveCast focuses on â€œfreshâ€ multimedia contents saving them in your online library, managing your contents and keeping them up to date across platforms.

It is integrated with the iPhone and Facebook via applications, and more applications and integration are underway.

Drivecast is being developed by Inrete, a Turin, Italy based Application Service Provider (ASP) and Systems Management Outsourcer for over a decade, and was the first Internet Service Provider (ISP) in Italy.Â  Its core offerings fall into categories of network management, e-mail, security, and measure of quality, and they service a customer base that spans though Europe and to Brazil.
